text: Casearia barteri is a species of plant in the Salicaceae family. It is found in Angola, Cameroon, Central African Republic, the Republic of the Congo, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Ivory Coast, Equatorial Guinea, Gabon, Ghana, Liberia, Nigeria, São Tomé and Príncipe, Sierra Leone, and Sudan. ==References== * barteri Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Casearia barteri
